error.message: Parameter $aliasManager of method Drupal\smart_login\Controller\SmartLoginController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().

Parameter $alias_manager of method Drupal\smart_login\Form\SmartLoginSettingsForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url::fromUri() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to smart_login.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
